name: WP.osC (WP-osCommerce)
short_description: WP-osCommerce (WP.osC) is a modified version of osCommerce ecommerce solution which uses the same Theme system (template files system) as WordPress. WP.osC allows you to integrate osCommerce into an existing Wordpress website. (Live Demo : wposc.com)
